name: Reform
headline: The AI-powered workspace for freight forwarding
description: Automate your repetitive tasks, interface directly with your own transport management system, and create dashboards in one single platform.

founders.name: Saif Abuhashish, Founder
founders.description: Saif is the co-founder of Reform. Prior to Reform, Saif was part of a 7 person team at Amazon responsible for building their worldwide robotics firmware. He was also tech lead at Drift where he built the foundations of their partnerships and integrations suite. Before that, he was engineer #1 on Capital One's conversational AI team and helped scale their product to millions of MAUs. Saif received his BS in Computer Engineering and Mathematics from Northeastern University.

founders.name: Omar Abuhashish, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO of Reform. BS in CS and mechanical & aerospace engineering from NYU. Prior to Reform, worked on new products at CoinTracker (YC W18) and was engineer #1 at Altan Insights.

# AI-powered workspace for freight forwarding
Automate your repetitive tasks, interface directly with your own systems, and create dashboards in one single platform.
[Book a demo](https://www.reformhq.com/<https:/calendly.com/d/cpdx-vq4-392>)
![Reform dashboard preview](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66f2d8bfde5edb4c68588b66_dashboards-full.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e15c45e90e0132f1224ac1_gradient-bg.jpg)
Trusted by industry leaders
![Schad logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e80a892be67f161b10d662_schad-logo-dark.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e81c26ad909c7be205ece7_joffroy-logo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66f0e3c1f55c771771373adf_image%20\(1\)%202%20\(1\).png%20\(SVG\).svg)![Customs Direct logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66f0653a5fa68cb9dfcdcb72_customs-direct-logo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e81b29004c10c9ecd7a975_transmute-logo.png)![Cota logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e81c98dbc65a6461c3b499_cota-systems.png)
## Gain 2,000+ hours per month
2.4M+
Documents processed
$100M+
Invoices processed
45,000+
Hours saved
$1M+
Annual savings per customer
## How it works
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
![](https://knowstory-public.s3.amazonaws.com/thumbnail.png)
01
### Describe how you process your data
Build a custom automation that represents your specific workflow for getting data from documents or emails.
02
### Set up your dashboards
Connect with the systems you use and build bespoke interfaces with the functionality your operators care about.
03
### Automate your operations
Watch Reform magically turn incoming documents and emails into actionable data and insights directly in your system of record.
![Find documents icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66eaaedecefe2295f8347a2c_find-documents.svg)
### Find documents
Quickly locate specific documents within large collections based on certain fields and criteria.
![Match documents icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66eaaede3ac41541350286f1_match-documents.svg)
### Match documents
Compare information across multiple documents, identifying discrepancies or confirming consistency. 
![Shape generation icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66eaaede7a91f51354a7f1ab_shape-generation.svg)
### Shape generation
Reform works out-of-the-box from day one â€” for any document, in any format, and with 98% accuracy.
## Functions we automate
[Warehouse](https://www.reformhq.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Operations](https://www.reformhq.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Finance](https://www.reformhq.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Customs](https://www.reformhq.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
Supercharge your warehouse efficiency
Connect Reform to your WMS for fast shipment orchestration and 75% time savings for receivers in the warehouse. Regardless of how bespoke your operations are, our turn-key AI-powered workflow automations help you minimize errors guarantee accurate updates in real-time.
Use cases
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
Warehouse receipt data-entry
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
Shipment delivery notifications to export coordinators
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
Shipper documentation validation and matching
[Book a demo](https://www.reformhq.com/<https:/calendly.com/d/cpdx-vq4-392>)
![Graphic that shows Reform warehouse features](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e05160d60cf96b0a675127_warehouse-receiving.jpg)
Optimize your export workflow
Empower your team with a unified workspace that streamlines communication, automates routine tasks, and provides real-time insights. From booking to documentation, our platform ensures smooth coordination across your entire export process and accelerates shipment cycles.
Use cases
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
Pickup order matching to warehouse receipt
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
Shareable analytics dashboards
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
Storage charges
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
EEI Filing with ACE for export declarations
[Book a Demo](https://www.reformhq.com/<https:/calendly.com/d/cpdx-vq4-392>)
![Graphic that shows Reform traffic coordination features](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e0515ef95c727ce0598b63_traffic-coordination.jpg)
Streamline your financial operations
By automating key accounting processes, Reform helps reduce human error, accelerates financial workflows, and provides real-time insights for better decision-making. This leads to improved cash flow management and more strategic financial planning for your freight forwarding business.
Use cases
![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
AP invoice automation
![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
Vendor statement reconciliation
![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
Report generation
[Book a Demo](https://www.reformhq.com/<https:/calendly.com/d/cpdx-vq4-392>)
![Graphic that shows Reform accounting features](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e051624dfe7db80ea9c006_accounting.jpg)
Simplify customs compliance
Our platform simplifies the complex world of customs regulations, reducing the risk of costly delays and penalties. With Reform, you can confidently navigate international trade requirements, ensure compliance, and focus on growing your business.
Use cases
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
In-bond movement filings (CBP Form 7512)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
Formal customs clearance entry (CBP Form 7501)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
ISF (10+2) filing into ACE
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
HS and HTC code lookup & classification
[Book a Demo](https://www.reformhq.com/<https:/calendly.com/d/cpdx-vq4-392>)
![Graphic that shows Reform customers filing features](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e051624dfe7db80ea9bffa_customs-filing.jpg)
## Features
![Image showing Reform triggers and actions](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1f7b4b258e8c60259f400_triggers_and_actions.jpg)
![Image showing Reform data processing workflows](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1f692961fd3c3dbf28f04_data-processing-workflows.jpg)
![Reform dashboard and interfaces graphic](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66f2d869a426bfc50962b276_dashboards-and-interfaces.jpg)
![Image showing Reform analytics feature](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e0515eca5a8a8d1dbe9650_analytics.jpg)
![Image showing Reform role-based access control feature](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e0515eaacfa88a652d1854_rbac.jpg)
![Image showing Reform API feature](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e0515e2cb075422ff2eba5_api-and-webhooks.jpg)
[Triggers & actions](https://www.reformhq.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-0>)[Data processing workflows](https://www.reformhq.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-1>)[Dashboards & interfaces](https://www.reformhq.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-2>)[Analytics](https://www.reformhq.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-3>)[Role-based access control (RBAC)](https://www.reformhq.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-4>)[API & Webhooks](https://www.reformhq.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-5>)
## Integrations
Seamlessly integrate with any TMS using our universal API, simplifying your logistics software connectivity.
![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
Magaya
![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
CargoWise
![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
Descartes
![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
Gmail
![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
Outlook
![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
Google Sheets
![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66e1571db3c13d6aa8204fda_checkmark.svg)
Zapier (+5,000 automations)
![Graphic that shows Reform's integrations](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66f2ef00ab89cf83ec93f1b4_integrations.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66f065cba278bdd5fb2a8861_cargo-ships-original-compressed.jpg)
In the coming years, AI will transform logistics & customs processes and we are determined to be at the forefront of the industry. Reformâ€™s roadmap paves a way for more efficient operations, and they have already demonstrated their ability to move fast and implement. Collaboration with Reform was an easy decision for us.
![Photo of Eduardo Joffroy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66f54365e3ea7cf19d2917b8_eduardo-joffroy.jpeg)
Eduardo Joffroy
CEO at Joffroy Global
[Read more](https://www.reformhq.com/</case-studies/joffroy>)
As a US brokerage firm working with thousands of lines of data daily, I am thrilled with the Reform product and team. Reform will allow us to ingest and queue up most of our lineage using their API, making our operation run smoother than ever before.
![Photo of Jim Masloski](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66f56b4a578097c0f0eb3230_jim-masloski.jpeg)
Jim Masloski
CEO at Customs Direct
[Read more](https://www.reformhq.com/</case-studies/customs-direct>)
Reform has not only saved us countless hours but also significantly improved our accuracy and data quality. We've been able to reallocate our staff to more value-added tasks, enhancing our overall efficiency and service quality.
![Photo of Mikael Schad](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9a3af8955b4e690fa5f33/66f1ab54c52b6a8f811eb7a6_mikael-schad.jpeg)
Mikael Schad
Director of Innovation, Fredric Schad, SAS
[Read more](https://www.reformhq.com/</case-studies/schad>)
Get started

generated_description:
Reform is a San Francisco-based startup that launched in 2023 and is currently part of Y Combinator's Batch W24. Its mission centers around revolutionizing freight forwarding with an AI-powered workspace designed to streamline processes for logistics and supply chain management. 

**What They Do:**
Reform aims to automate repetitive tasks, seamlessly interface with existing transport management systems, and create customizable dashboardsâ€”all within a single platform. It's an ambitious solution catering to the needs of freight forwarders, giving them the tools to enhance operational efficiency dramatically. In fact, Reform touts that it can save users over 2,000 hours monthly by efficiently processing millions of documents and invoices in record time.

**How It Works:**
1. **Custom Automation:** Users can easily design workflows that align with their unique business processes, leveraging incoming documents and emails as sources of actionable data.
2. **User-Friendly Dashboards:** The platform integrates with various systems to present tailored insights that matter most to operators.
3. **Smart Operations:** Reform transforms raw data into useful insights directly within clientsâ€™ systems, automating what is often a labor-intensive process.

Reform is backed by a team of four, led by Brad Flora, whose experience and vision in the logistics domain stands out. The company is positioned in several key tags: SaaS, logistics, supply-chain, AI, and the competitive San Francisco Bay Area.

**Why This Matters:**
Logistics is notoriously complex, and the traditional methods often lead to inefficiencies and errors. Reformâ€™s approach not only talks about saving time and reducing costs but also promises a significant leap in accuracy and reliabilityâ€”a critical factor in an industry that thrives on precision. Their dashboard and analytics features offer insights that help organizations make strategic decisions swiftly.

Ultimately, with Reform, you gain a partner committed to making freight forwarding more effective, allowing your business to focus on growth and customer satisfaction while they handle the nitty-gritty details. Interested in seeing how it works? You can book a demo on their [website](https://www.reformhq.com) to explore further.
